Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e819fdab68106cb386b463d84e158d6a/tumblr_inline_nadgl16XYm1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Bye, Hugo. Your work will live on in <em>KSP</em>.</p>
Pretty nice, actually. Does it come with an updated IVA?
Looks awesome! Much better for big planes now.
Love it! Though I notice that the shape is a bit different... But what-ever, I don't have any craft using those parts for the same reason that they have been redone. I hope it has an IVA this time.
wait, is this going to replace the Mark 3 Cockpit and its other associated parts?

Yeeeeeeeeaaaahhhh! Awesome!

I also hope we'll get a proper IVA this time. Can't wait for the release!

Is the Intake a part of the fuselage? Or is it an intake slapped on the front? Either way i love it, looks way cooler. More shuttle-y too, sounds like i might start making mk 3 space planes. (theres an idea, space plane parts to go with! as in cargo bays and such)
That's three parts: fuselage, cockpit, and intake, per MaxMaps during the stream.

wait, is this going to replace the Mark 3 Cockpit and its other associated parts?

Yes the mk3 line of parts was scrapped. This is replacing them
Th back part looks like a cargo bay. Will we have cargo bays in next update?

Yes the mk3 line of parts was scrapped. This is replacing them

That looks AWESOME! Sorry man, but I'll need proof to believe this is a replacement, I don't think I'd really mind if the cockpit was replaced . Awesome Hugo! I'll miss you...

Edited August 16, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

That looks AWESOME! Sorry man, but I'll need proof to believe this is a replacement, I don't think I'd really mind if the cockpit was replaced . Awesome Hugo! I'll miss you...

From what max said on squadcast it sounded like this was replacing the mk3 but I could be wrong. All I know is that the mk3 line was scrapped
Of course it is, I just got the old mk3 expansion working and made a stable shuttle design using it.... :'(
Hmm, if Mk3 was scrapped then does that mean that these are Mk4 parts?

hmm, if mk3 was scrapped then does that mean that these are mk4 parts?

Mk 3.3.

From what max said on squadcast it sounded like this was replacing the mk3 but I could be wrong. All I know is that the mk3 line was scrapped

Very cool... I still have yet to know if there is IVA for the Mk2 cockpit and can. I hope to be using this in the future .
Looking good! Best of luck Hugo and I can't wait for these parts. This reminds me a bit of the cockpit from KAX.

Sweet!

I wonder if something like the Lab-Module would fit in a cargobay of that size. From that picture I would say maybe. that would be even sweeter.
I like it. Looks a bit like a Hercules Cockpit.. Hopefully it has an IVA, and maybe also a cargobay. That would be great!
Not bad for (AFAIK) a summer holiday temp. If that is a cargo bay then very nice.

Cargo bay or not this is probably the most anticipated parts I've been waiting for since the dev notes commented on new spaceplane parts! Well done Hugo!

The SPH dwellers (me included) will sorely miss you!
PLEASE put this in-game! The current spaceplane parts are too old....

oh no my least favourite set of parts in this game is being redone ._.

i kinda hoped they would be replaced with something more B9-looking. with, you know, symetric edges and stuffs

i would llike it much more if SQUAD gave Porkjet some monies and let him make sweet stuff.

of course i appreciate hugo's work, but it still doesnt fit my style. i guess ill just keep using SP+

Edited August 16, 2014 by Veeltch

Very cool... I still have yet to know if there is IVA for the Mk2 cockpit and can. I hope to be using this in the future .
There is this one. It's a year old, but still works, and I like it a lot:

Sam Hall's Mk2 Cockpit Internals mod

There is this one. It's a year old, but still works, and I like it a lot:

Sam Hall's Mk2 Cockpit Internals mod

I'm not a fan of those internals though. For me the smooth curves don't fit with the exterior straight lines. It is a good mod though and many of the YouTubers use it.
